    • Method Detail

      • setUpOverScroll

        public static IOverScrollDecor setUpOverScroll(android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView recyclerView,
                                               int orientation)
        Set up the over-scroll effect over a specified RecyclerView view.
        Only recycler-views using native Android layout managers (i.e. LinearLayoutManager, GridLayoutManager and StaggeredGridLayoutManager) are currently supported by this convenience method.
        Parameters:
        recyclerView - The view.
        orientation - Either ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL or ORIENTATION_VERTICAL.
        Returns:
        The over-scroll effect 'decorator', enabling further effect configuration.

      • setUpOverScroll

        public static IOverScrollDecor setUpOverScroll(android.widget.ListView listView)

      • setUpOverScroll

        public static IOverScrollDecor setUpOverScroll(android.widget.GridView gridView)

      • setUpOverScroll

        public static IOverScrollDecor setUpOverScroll(android.widget.ScrollView scrollView)

      • setUpOverScroll

        public static IOverScrollDecor setUpOverScroll(android.widget.HorizontalScrollView scrollView)

      • setUpStaticOverScroll

        public static IOverScrollDecor setUpStaticOverScroll(android.view.View view,
                                                     int orientation)
        Set up the over-scroll over a generic view, assumed to always be over-scroll ready (e.g. a plain text field, image view).
        Parameters:
        view - The view.
        orientation - One of ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL or ORIENTATION_VERTICAL.
        Returns:
        The over-scroll effect 'decorator', enabling further effect configuration.

      • setUpOverScroll

        public static IOverScrollDecor setUpOverScroll(android.support.v4.view.ViewPager viewPager)
